abstract.text: Constants for isolating specific traits of a font.

inlineContent.text: categorizes fonts according to a small set of traits. You can convert fonts by adding and removing individual traits, and you can get a font with a specific combination of traits.
These pairs of traits are mutually exclusive:

abstract.text: Construct and manage a graphical, event-driven user interface for your macOS app.
The representation of a font in an app.
